author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: فسبحان الله عمّا أنتم تظنّون يا ملأ المبغضين، إن كان هذا الأمر حقّ من عند الله لن يقدر أحد أن يمنعه، وإن لم يكن من عنده يكفيه علماءكم والّذين هم اتّبعوا هواهم وكانوا من المعرضين، أما سمعت ما قال مؤمن آل فرعون من قبل وحكى الله
translation: Know thou, moreover, that He it is Who hath, by His own behest, created all that is in the heavens and all that is on the earth. How can, then, the thing that hath been created at His bidding prevail against Him? High is God exalted above what ye imagine about Him, ye people of malice! If this Cause be of God, no man can prevail against it; and if it be not of God, the divines amongst you, and they that follow their corrupt desires and such as have rebelled against Him will surely suffice to overpower it.
